extendedInfo.description: IMPORTANT NOTICE: A NEW BUILD OF THE GAME WAS RELEASED AND FUTURE UPDATES WILL BE APPLIED THERE. HOWEVER YOU CAN STILL PLAY THIS BUILD AS WE WILL NOT REMOVE IT FROM THE STORE.THE NEWEST BUILD OF "TRIGGER KNIGHT" IS HERE:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.mintsphere.TriggerKnightPLEASE SUPPORT THE NEW BUILD! IF IT BECOME THIS BIG, WE WILL ADD MORE MAJOR UPDATES THERE!=====An Experimental Mini-Survival RPG that uses one-button mechanics!Guide the Knight to defeat as many enemies as she can before her health energy ends! Gather gold via combats, and direct her to stronger equipment, healing items, and divine deathblow techniques to defeat deadly dragons, in multiple rapid split-second decisions!COMPLEXITYThe Knight's survival depends on your active management of her health, always-decreasing lifespan bar, weapons and armor level, items and timing to use it, gold, quick decision making, the ability to plan ahead, and luck! Test how far you can go by using the score system! All these complex challenges are balanced by:SIMPLICITYDefeat all of them with just a single click or tap!INSTRUCTIONSNew items - armor, weapons, power ups, health energy, etc. - will appear. Tap on the screen to purchase the active item to manage your Knight's abilities. Select carefully, since poor choices will lead to an early end to the game.

reviews.title: Loved it
reviews.comment: It\'s style is so well made, I\'ve spent hours here and still spend more. It\'s challenging but in a good way
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: I\'ve played this for hours and loved every moment of it. Adding a Mute function for music would be a welcome addition. As much as I LOVE the soundtrack, it would be cool to have my own playlists playing while I wipe out those Dragons.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Game play is kinda basic but boundless amounts of fun, great music and at times challenging. I recommend installing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: Nice bgm that never gets old. Nice game concept. Acceptable graphics. Just wish the game had more progression, more contents (equipment, item, upgrades show in character\'s sprite etc). Adding some rpg elements to the game would have made it great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5star maybe
reviews.comment: Need more to the game. Sound was good too but, after day12 you should change the music. Game headed in a proper direction just add more to game play..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.comment: For what it is this is a great game and the pixel art is pretty well done. I could see this being used for a greater project later on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: this game is unique, inovative, and addictive. Would love to play it over and over again, unfortunately my level is too high for the dragon, it\'s no longer a challenge.
reviews.author: Aryadi Subagio

reviews.title: Played this one too!
reviews.comment: This one is somehow much more easy. But still keep up the good work guys!
reviews.author: Yui Ko

reviews.title: Got a phone call and when I opened the game couldn\'t click on resume
reviews.comment: Love the game but please add more Galaxy Nexus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: Better than those running and jumping game.  Btw, I just reached day 29 with around 22000 gold (from gold voucher + slay a dragon). After that, the game give me 3 dragons without any store (divine edge or elixir). I end up losing with too much gold. That is not fair, please fix that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: worth 5 stars
reviews.comment: really enjoy playing it, got all equiment in the 22 day. hope you could make more game like this
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: This game is unique and interesting but way too easy and gets boring fast.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cute and fun, but...
reviews.comment: Whenever I pause for more than 10+ seconds the entire game freezes up and I loose all progress. 4 stars if they can fix it. 5 stars if those ridiculous ads were removed. Just charge $1 for the game to prevent it. I\'ll happily buy it!
reviews.author: Andrew Kieta

reviews.title: Gem from Newgrounds
reviews.comment: I remember playing this on NG and it was captivating then too. Humble opinion: need more weapons/armor and more variety - maybe after 20 levels you get the option of running in another (harder) world with different equips and monsters. Would also love to see more movements on the sprites, and also the option of buying new character with the exp you collect. Finally, the different equips should be visible on the characters.
reviews.author: Chimaobi Ahamba

reviews.title: Simple yet strategic
reviews.comment: The simple gameplay where you need to know when to spend your resources, and you are still rewarded with the level up system for all subsequent playthroughs is really good. But the BGM is so well blended on it that makes the game even more enjoyable.  It also nice to see an action game with anime like graphics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Super awesome game need a few changes that are minor like having more than 999 limit on attack power etc... Overall very time killing fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Survival skills
reviews.comment: Great game I love the music and I like her sword:P I didn\'t get how to play at first but I got it after the day 2 its all about helping her survive pretty good game u better have survival skills and know how to conserve
reviews.author: Ares Armond

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Can\'t wait for the updates, probably make new charaters
reviews.author: Sunny Dean

reviews.title: Cool idea
reviews.comment: Once you figure some things out then the game becomes easy. It\'s nice to mess around on if you have some time to kill. I got a glitch where I could not continue playing after I received a call, which sucked because I was at day 23 with like 45k gold. I couldn\'t lose unless I stopped tapping the screen.
reviews.author: Miguel Morales

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Played this a lot, really addictive!!
reviews.author: A Google User
